name: Traveler's Handy Sword
title: Traveler's Companion: Traveler's Handy Sword
desc: A handy steel sword that contains all manner of useful items in its sheath.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.(<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
